meanings.sent1: The ganglionated nerve fibers transmit signals throughout the body.
meanings.sent2: The ganglionated structure of the nervous system helps regulate bodily functions.
meanings.sent3: The ganglionated network of nerves in the body is like a busy city with many intersections.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a ganglionated web of thoughts, each connected to the next.
meanings.sent5: The ganglionated clusters of nerves resembled tiny knots in a complex web.

meanings.sent1: The ganglionated neurons in the brain play a crucial role in processing information.
meanings.sent2: The ganglionated nerves in the spinal cord help coordinate movement.
meanings.sent3: The ganglionated nerve cells in the body are like little hubs of activity.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were ganglionated, each idea branching out like a network of roads.
meanings.sent5: The ganglionated clusters of cells resembled tiny islands in a vast sea of tissue.
